note: Awkwardly tall fellow who occasionally writes, draws, and tries to be reasonable. Connoisseur of defunct 90s card games.

fields.name: I blog sometimes I guess
fields.value: http://www.gtkashi.com

fields.name: Location
fields.value: If you're not from Seattle then I'm from Seattle.

fields.name: Reasonably Enjoys...
fields.value: Star Trek, Magic the Gathering, Final Fantasy, Ancient defunct card games (Ani-Mayhem, Middle Earth CCG, L5R, Star Trek CCG)

fields.name: In this theater that I call my soul
fields.value: I always play the starring role
